Description Of This Peninsula Fast Food Restaurant Business For Sale: This Castro Street food business has a strong corner location with heavy foot traffic. Its 1,121 sq ft includes a walk-in refrigerator and freezer, 3 Taylor Y754-33 frozen yogurt machines, 1 refrigerated display case, and much more. If interested in a food business on Castro Street, this one is already grandfathered in--buyer will not have to pay a 50K parking fee to the city. This location is attractively built out and has lots of windows making it ideal for an ice cream shop or desert cafe. Owners are absentee. A hands-on operator could easily bolster sales by expanding the current concept with new menu items. No hood or cook line. New lease available. Asking 35,000.
